subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Scott Dixon held off Sam Hornish Jr., Dario Franchitti, Tony Kanaan and Marco Andretti over the final 14 laps to win the Watkins Glen Grand Prix Sunday.
snippet: Scott Dixon held off Sam Hornish Jr., Dario Franchitti, Tony Kanaan and Marco Andretti over the final 14 laps to win the Watkins Glen Grand Prix Sunday.
